## Reload Logon

The following chucnk needs to be executed when passwords have changed.
The password needs to be removed from the excel first.
[SAP_LOGON.xlsx](https://grandvision-my.sharepoint.com/personal/floris_padt_grandvision_com/Documents/Documents/RTT/SAP_LOGON.xlsx?web=1)

```{r Reload_SAP_LOGON, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}

dtSAP_LOGON <- 
  as.data.table( read_excel("~/RTT/SAP_LOGON.xlsx"))
save(dtSAP_LOGON, file = "~/RTT/SAP_LOGON.RData")

```
